label: Albertoni, Fabiano F.  2017. Morphology and natural history of two species of bromeliad leaf beetles in the genus Calliaspis Dejean, 1836 from Southern Brazil, with a summary of  the current knowledge of Imatidiini immatures  (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae). Zootaxa 4312(1): 113–142.

title: Morphology and natural history of two species of bromeliad leaf beetles in the genus Calliaspis Dejean, 1836 from Southern Brazil, with a summary of the current knowledge of Imatidiini immatures (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae)
